title: Measure_Leakage
description: Provides a context for scripts that measure leakage of their quantum dot devices.

getter.description: The instrument (and channel) to collect the applied voltage from

voltage.description: The voltage to apply to raise the gate voltage above ground in V.

returns.description: Leakage of the getter in nA.

allOf.description: Annotates the concrete type of the MeasurementResponse value
